item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Werewolf.by.Night.in.Color.2023.720p/1080p.DSNP.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.Atmos.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
Werewolf by Night in Color

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Alternate Artwork 6 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3 | Key Art


2023 • 54m
Horror, Fantasy, Super Hero, Action-Adventure

Description
Now presented in color, Marvel Studios’ “Werewolf by Night in Color” takes place on a dark and somber night as a secret cabal of monster hunters emerge from the shadows and gather at the foreboding Bloodstone Temple following the death of their leader. In a strange and macabre memorial to the leader’s life, the attendees are thrust into a deadly competition for a powerful relic.
Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
Now presented in vibrant color, Marvel Studios’ “Werewolf by Night in Color” takes place on a dark and somber night as a secret cabal of monster hunters emerge from the shadows and gather at the foreboding Bloodstone Temple following the death of their leader. In a strange and macabre memorial to the leader’s life, the attendees are thrust into a mysterious and deadly competition for a powerful relic—a hunt that will ultimately bring them face to face with a dangerous monster. Inspired by horror films of the 1930s and 1940s, the chilling special aims to evoke a sense of dread and the macabre, with plenty of suspense and scares along the way as we explore a new corner of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Duration: 54m
Release Date: 2023
Genre: Horror, Fantasy, Super Hero, Action-Adventure
Rating:
Director: Michael Giacchino
Starring: Gael García Bernal, Laura Donnelly, Harriet Sansom Harris, Kirk R. Thatcher, Eugenie Bondurant, Leonardo Nam
Click to expand...
